snippet: The veteran stars Ronaldinho, Kaká and Robinho were left off Brazil’s World Cup roster by Coach Luiz Felipe Scolari, who selected just five players who went to the 2010 tournament.
abstract: Veteran soccer stars Ronladinho, Kaka and Robinho are left off Brazil's World Cup roster by coach Luiz Felipe Scolari, who selected just five players who went to the 2010 tournament.
lead_paragraph: The veteran stars Ronaldinho, Kaká and Robinho were left off Brazil’s World Cup roster by Coach Luiz Felipe Scolari, who selected just five players who went to the 2010 tournament.
